title: Olympic Channel podcast with Lindsey Vonn, Mikaela Shiffrin and the Korea Unified hockey team
description: Olympic Channel is the place where the Games never end and neither does the podcast! These are probably the best interviews we have done here. Both Lindsey and Mikaela were really honest and open and it was an absolute privilege to speak to the athletes from North and South Korea. We'll be taking a short break for a couple of weeks but will be back very soon for even more very, very soon.
